decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be completed in the materials specified on the approved plans and within the planning application form, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01 , 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08, 09, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, Design & Access Statement Received 10/12/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The building hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling on this site and shall not be occupied as primary residential accommodation or as a separate dwelling or for any business use.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the single-storey rear extension and outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.
Condition : 7 - The existing vehicular access to Jersey Road shall be reinstated as footway at the expense of the applicant prior to the formation of any new vehicular crossover to the property.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, rear and side dormers to the house, and the erection of a single-storey outbuilding in rear garden for use as a gym/store with new hardstanding and vehicle access to the front of the house.
